Package aschmutz

Class Wordpair

java.lang.Object
aschmutz.Wordpair
public class Wordpair extends Object
Stores a wordpair, containing a Word and a URL poninting to an image, that is descriptive of the Word. The wordpair is intendet to be used with the WordtrainerBackend.

      public Wordpair(String word, String url)
      Creates a new Wordpair that stores a Word and its Descriptive Image
      Parameters:
      word - the Word that it will store
      url - The URL of an Immage. It must be a full domain starting with "http(s)://"

      Sets the Image URL for the Wordpair
      Parameters:
      url - The stirng o of an URL that will be used as the image
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Throws an IllegalArgument Exception if the given URL is not convertable to a java URL Object / is not a full domain

    • setWord

      public void setWord(String word)
      Sets the word that will be used in the Wordpair, and that will be checked against in the validate method
      Parameters:
      word - The word that will be used in the Wordpair. It must not be Empty or Null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the wod is null, or an Empty string, a IllegalArgumentExcepption will be thrown

    • validate

      public boolean validate(String word)
      Validates the word that is given as a parameter in context with the Word, set in the constructor or setWord method.
      Parameters:
      word - The word that will be checkeed
      Returns:
      if the word is a valid equal to the word contained in the wordpair

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
